entry.title: New release for AList: v3.38.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • offline_download: Add transmission (close #4102 in #7232)  -  by @SheltonZhu in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/4102 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/7232 (bdf4b)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Terabox ( close #6961 close #6983 in #7279)  -  by @URenko in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6961, https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/6983 and https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/7279 (5f19d)
  • 115: Use latest appVer for upload  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/alist-org/alist/issues/7315 (c3e43)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.39.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add febbox driver (#7304 close #7293)  -  by @Three-taile-dragon in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7304 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7293 (e8538)
  • Support general users view and cancel own tasks (#7416 close #7398)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7416 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7398 (64ceb)
  • local: Thumbnail token bucket smooth migration  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7425 (34a14)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • 115:
  • Enforce 20GB file size limit on uploadev (#7447 close #7413)  -  by @SheltonZhu in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7447 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7413 (216e3)
  • 20GB file upload restriction  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7452 (b803b)
  • cloudreve:
  • Path not exist when moving/copying files  -  by @Unic96 and È©¨Âª∫ÂÜõ in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7432 (ce0b9)
  • ilanzou:
  • Fix infinite loop when getting file list (#7366 close #7357)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7366 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7357 (48ac2)
  • Fix upload failure for small files (#7368 close #7250)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7368 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7250 (a2dc4)
  • local:
  • Cross-device file move  -  by @Rirmach in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7430 (10c7e)

   üèé Performance

  • 123pan: Change domain of login  -  by @hanbao233xD in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7325 (28305)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.39.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • 115: Enhance cache  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7479 (0a469)
  • baidu_netdisk,baidu_photo: Add and fix hashinfo  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7469 (67c93)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • pikpak:
  • Domain block and change to NET  -  by @BlueSkyXN in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7350 (a4ad9)
  • storage:
  • Delete storage fails if a panic occurred during initialization  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7501 (1c01d)
  • terabox:
  • Big file upload issue (#7498 close #7490)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7498 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7490 (6c38c)
  • Panic due to slice out of range (#7499 close #7487)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7499 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7487 (c3c58)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.40.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • security: Generating random string with crypto rand  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7525 (12b42)
  • sso: Generate and verify OAuth state with go-cache  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7527 (398c0)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • baidu_netdisk: Update fileToObj to use ServerCtime and ServerMtime  -  by @Kuingsmile in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7535 (94915)
  • local: Preserve file owner when copying  -  by @Rirmach in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7528 (25c5e)
  • net: Close of closed channel  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7529 (4c0cf)
  • pikpak&pikpak_share: Captcha_sign error (#7530 close #7481 close #7482)  -  by @Three-taile-dragon in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7530, https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7481 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7482 (2dec7)
  • sso: OIDC compatibility mode  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7524 (150dc)
    View changes on GitHub
